text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
—— Books are great. 
Do you partake in reading?

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Tales or tomes — even a lexicon will do. 
Knowledge is nourishment, leading to 
eventual phronesis.

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text: The unsage dressing themselves in flowery rhetoric is like dressing up a skeleton with beautiful clothes — " vanitas vanitatum".

text_block_list.name: Tanino Gimlet
text_block_list.text:
Only the truly wise are worthy of 
being adorned with wisdom……!
